sourcesContent:
Edit employee

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-edit-employee', templateUrl: './edit-employee.component.html', styleUrls: ['./edit-employee.component.css'] }) export class EditEmployeeComponent { constructor(private route: ActivatedRoute){} ngOnInit(): void { this.route.paramMap.subscribe({ next:(params) => { const id = params.get('id'); } }) } }
